definition: variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]

sentences.english: She brushed aside all difficulties and in the end succeeded.
sentences.chinese: 她藐视一切困难，最后终于成功了。

sentences.english: Endearing young lovers defying all odds and expectations.
sentences.chinese: 爱的年轻的恋人们藐视一切困难和期望。

definition: the eye can see nothing worthwhile all around (idiom); arrogant/condescending/supercilious
to think little of/to look down on
to look disdainfully out of the corner of one's eye
to consider oneself unexcelled in the world/to be insufferably arrogant
submit to me and prosper, or oppose me and perish
pinyin: shun4 wo3 zhe3 chang1 ni4 wo3 zhe3 wang2

definition: to turn up one's nose/to show disdain for/to regard superciliously
